sentences.en: A brood of modern paintings will be exhibited at the museum.
sentences.cn: 一批现代画将在博物馆展览.

sentences.en: Clyde himself did not brood over the matter.
sentences.cn: 克莱德没把这件事放在心上.

sentences.en: Don’t sit at home brooding all day.
sentences.cn: 别整天坐在家里闷闷不乐的。

sentences.en: Extrovert prefer lively conversation to brood on the meaning of life.
sentences.cn: 性格外向的人喜欢高谈阔论，而不愿思索人生的意义。

sentences.en: I continued to brood. Would he always be like this?
sentences.cn: 我一直不安：他会一直这样吗？

sentences.en: It is time for hens to brood.
sentences.cn: 该是母鸡孵蛋的时候了.

sentences.en: It's a time for hens to brood.
Speak out. Don't just brood over things.
sentences.cn: 你有什么事就说吧, 别圈在心里.

sentences.en: The bird was trying to find food for its brood.
sentences.cn: 鸟儿在为它的一窝小鸟觅食.

sentences.en: The hen brought off a brood of young.
The moment I am bound I begin to brood on freedom.
sentences.cn: 一旦受到约束,我就开始盘算如何争取自由.

sentences.en: The younger fellows were to compete in the running brood jump.
sentences.cn: 小伙子们呢,要比赛急行跳远.

sentences.en: Under every guilty secret there is hidden a brood of guilty wishes.
sentences.cn: 在每一种罪恶的秘密下面,总有成堆罪恶的愿望被掩盖着.

sentences.en: Vapor jetted from the brood hose as from a little steam engine.
sentences.cn: 大鼻子里象小小的蒸气机似的冒出热气.

sentences.en: You seem to brood over things.
sentences.cn: 你好像有什么事闷在心里.

words.tran_cn: 孵卵的；多产的；多思考的
孵卵器；沉思的人；育雏的人（或动物）

phrases.tran_cn: 念念不忘， 计较（特指忿恨不满）
计较（尤指忿恨不满）；郁闷地沉思

trans.tran_en: a family of young birds all born at the same time
if a bird broods, it sits on its eggs to make the young birds break out
to keep thinking about something that you are worried or upset about
